page.title: 16A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: {A SCHOOL DAY I had my drink of ribena then I got out of bed and got dressed and combed my hair. I had a wash and brushed my teeth.I went downstairs and had some Honey Smacks for my breakfast.I put my shoes on and had my hair tied up .I put my coat and bag on and went to school.At school I did some maths afterwards we had assembly.Then it was playtime so I stayed in and played my recorder.When playtime was over I went on to Space_ex a computer adventure game.I had school dinner,it was Stew and Dumplings with Vegetables and sponge and custard for pudding. I did some more computer work and had a recorder lesson then I walked home. When I got home I had a sweet and watched television.Then I had tea and a bath and watched television again and had some coffee then I went to bed
